name: Lemongrass Pear Soap
description:
Our Lemongrass Soap is perfect for any guest bathroom.  We use organic vanilla beans for the "speckle", our luxurious Sprout blend of organic oils and butters and the same light, fresh lemongrass scent.  Each pear will come packed with a twig stem, a mulberry paper leaf, a light dusting of golden mica, wrapped in cello and tied with a ribbon.  All you have to do is order and your lovely soap comes dressed for the party.

Quantities are limited

3.5oz

This item is certified organic

name: Salt Soap Trio Gift Pack
description:
We have combined our popular Lime Salt Bar and Orange Salt Bar with a limited edition Pink Grapefruit Salt Bar with pink Himalayan salt in this perfect-for-anyone gift.  These wonderful soaps are packed in shredded tissue, nestled in a sturdy box, wrapped with red burlap ribbon and then shrink wrapped just in case you need to mail them.  In addition, we have hung a tag that explains the benefits of using a salt soap to bathe with.

We introduced this gift pack at a recent retail show and sold out within the first couple of hours.  It seems everyone knows someone who would love this gift!

Bright, uplifting citrus essential oil blends make these invigorating soaps a real joy to use.  For more information on our salt bars, go to the individual pages for these soaps.

Three 6oz bars.

These soaps are certified organic.

Shipping Costs:  After the shipping cost of the first pack ($9.00 for US) then each additional pack will cost 2.50 shipping.

name: Potion #6
description: This luxurious oil serum is a carefully formulated mix of 14 oils and essential oils each chosen specifically for their anti-ageing, nutritious and vitamin rich benefits for skin. Originally formulated to be a facial serum, Potion #6 has become popular for any place you have delicate skin that needs extra nourishment.  It sinks into the skin immediately leaving no oily residue.  This is made for all skin types.  Only a drop or two is needed.  Potion is scented with a blend of Lavender, Rose Geranium and Tea Tree essential oils.  A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Lime Salt Bar with Atlantic Sea Salt
description:
Tart, refreshing, conditioning.  This bar has it all.  Our salt bars are 45% Atlantic sea salt.  This makes for a mineral and calcium rich bar with the texture of a smooth stone.  These bars are not exfoliating but, instead, produce rich fluffy lather full of moisture.  They can become quite addicting!  Salt bars are very heavy and last much longer than our regular bars.  The sea salt actually makes it much easier for the naturally occurring glycerin in our soaps to penetrate the skin.  You will love how your skin feels after using one of these special bars.
We scented this bar with a tart, lively essential oil blend of fresh lime, lavender and evergreen essential oils and it is fast becoming everyone's favorite. (But don't blame us if you start craving a Margarita!)

Net wt. approx. 6oz.

Ingredients:  Organic Coconut Oil, Atlantic Sea Salt, Distilled Water, Organic Shea Butter, Essential Oils, Dehydrated Lime Slice.

name: Orange Salt with Pumpkin and Coconut Milk
description:
We are crazy about salt bars!  These bars are not exfoliating but have the texture of a smooth stone.  We use pure Atlantic sea salt and add it to equal as much as 95% the weight of the oils and butters (depending on our formula) to produce a whole new bathing experience!  We even gave it it's own category!!  Salt bars are full of minerals (like calcium) that actually help the naturally occurring glycerin in our soaps penetrate the skin more easily.  They produce abundant, rich, lotion like lather full of moisture.
Because they are so hard and difficult to cut without crumbling, we mold ours into bars for a shape a little different from our Artisanal line.  You will find that these heavy bars last longer than regular soap...unless you are like us and have Lather, Rinse, Repeat Syndrome!
We are all about using foods in our soaps that have great skin benefits.  Orange Salt is made with organic pumpkin puree (think abundant anti-oxidants) and rich organic coconut milk.  Yum!
The scent is a softly spiced orange with hints of ginger and nutmeg among others.

Ingredients: Organic Coconut Oil, Atlantic Sea Salt, Coconut Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Pumpkin Puree, Essential Oils, Organic Shea Butter.

name: Mimosa Soap with Organic Shea and Cocoa Butters
description:
Growing up in North Carolina, the sweet scent of these "powder puff" blossoms bring back childhood memories of warm nights filled with lightening bugs and the sounds of ice filled glasses and soft laughter.  Most people think of Mimosa as a brunch drink made with orange juice and champagne.  We tried to combine both scents in the softly floral and orange scented soap.  This is a good example of why we love to use essential oils.  Fragrance oils are a little heavier and linger much longer as well as being made up of synthetic ingredients that could cause allergic reactions.  Essential oils are volatile...meaning they don't last a long time...and usually don't cause adverse reactions like headaches, for instance.  We are able to use these pure plant oils in aromatheraputic combinations that can do good things like lift our spirits, soothe our jangled nerves or even help us to have a great night's sleep.  Mimosa is a combination of all of these in a moisturizing formula that leaves you and your skin feeling soft and soothed.
We used a super deluxe combination of organic oils and butters and then added a little mild cosmetic clay to get you super clean and your skin toned and refined.
Mimosa....an homage to happy childhood memories, slow southern nights and celebratory brunches.  Ahhh...aren't you already feeling more relaxed?

Ingredients:  Organic Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Castor Oil, Essential Oils, Beeswax, Yellow Brazilian Clay, Tussah Silk, Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Mica.

name: Roses and Lavender Soap with Rose Clay and White Kaolin Clay
description:
When we sampled our new soaps, this was the sample that everyone wanted.  Not only is this an incredibly beautiful soap, it is an amazing bar all around.  We tried a new formula that is palm free and, wow!  The lather and hardness is just incredible.  This means your beautiful soap will last a really long time and you will get amazing lather until the last little sliver.  Not only do we use an impressive list of oils in our formula (like evening primrose, macadamia nut, rice bran...) but we also added two types of mild cosmetic clays to supply minerals and tone and refine the skin.  We usually talk about our more exotic oils (see above) and don't really mention our favorite workhorse...our organic, cold pressed olive oil.  A mainstay of every formula, this rich, green, fragrant oil is just full of everything your skin loves to keep it smooth, moist and happy.  
We have had lots of requests for a rose scented soap.  We have also had lots of requests for a lavender scented soap.  We found that an all rose scent is a little heavy for our tastes and an all lavender, as well as being a little plain, is somewhat astringent smelling.  We can't give the whole formula away, but we have combined Bulgarian rose absolute (expensive, yes, but worth it!) with lavender essential oil along with a couple of other essential oils to produce this softly rose scented blend that is not too sweet and heaven to use.  This is definitely a new take on rose!
Topping this beauty off is a combination of organic tea roses and cosmetic safe iridescent glitter.  A girl just NEEDS a little glitter sometimes!!

Ingredients:  Organic Olive Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Rice Bran Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Essential Oils, Evening Primrose Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Organic Castor Oil, Rose Clay, White Kaolin Clay, Ultramarine Oxides, Mica, Organic Rose Buds.

name: Red Sky Soap with Tomatoes, Carrots and Buttermilk
description:
Formulated to help with oily, troubled skin, Red Sky is packed with power.  Organic tomatoes and carrots supply lycopene and beta carotene.  Both carrots and tomatoes are full of antioxidants that help with protecting your skin from environmental pollutants.  A major component of Red Sky is the benefit of the Alpha Hydroxy Acids from the tomatoes, carrots and buttermilk.  Your skin is gently exfoliated,cleansed and neutralized with this refreshing, nourishing soap.  The acids in tomatoes make them especially effective when used on oily, troubled skin but we have noticed that most skin types love this soap.  
We also have included Brazilian red clay in this formula to tone, add minerals and refine pore size.  The beautiful color is completely from the tomatoes, carrots and clay and nothing else!  There is also a touch of activated bamboo charcoal for detoxifying the skin. Jojoba and Aloe oils make this spicy bar soothing and non-drying without being oily.
You will be able to detect a faint aroma from all the tomatoes and we complemented this with an herbaceous essential oil blend that will have you feeling like you just walked through a late summer garden.  

Ingredients:  Organic Olive Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Organic Tomato Puree, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Carrot Puree, Buttermilk Powder, Organic Castor Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, Essential Oils, Organic Aloe Oil, Beeswax, Tomato Powder, Red Brazilian Clay, Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Organic Nigella Seeds.

name: Soak! Moisturizing Bath Salt Soak and Salt Scrub in Two Scents
description:
Soak!...how to describe it?  I was having a hard time with my dry, dry skin.  I need to soak my sore muscles and back at night but my skin was getting pretty grouchy!  Soak! is the result of my quest to satisfy both skin and muscles and, I have to say, I am truly addicted to it!

We are learning that soaking in a mineral rich bath with bicarbonate of soda actually provides us with hard to obtain minerals that we need to stay healthy and even stress free.  We also know that these salts are a wonderful way to detox our bodies and rid them of excess water.  We don't need much but this can make a huge difference in how we feel.

Soak! can also be used as a scrub but not on the face.  Salt is an agressive scrub so use gently on wet skin.  Rinse off and pat dry.

We have taken lots of butters, Dead Sea Salts, Epsom Salts,  nutritious oils, Goat's Milk, Buttermilk and emulsifying oils like fractionated Coconut oil and added wonderfully aromatheraputic essential oil blends to create a truly unique product!  Just stir the contents (it tends to settle and slightly separate) and add one or two scoops to a warm bath.  The mixture dissolves almost imediately and the water will have a milky cast.  The incredible scent will vaporize and your mood improve.  

We could have packed it in smaller amounts but felt that it would just end up frustrating our customers by having to order constantly.  We know you are going to be hooked!!

Net Wt. 18oz.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

options.name: Soak! in soothing, luxurious Bulgarian Rose

name: Sea Soap with Shea Butter and Spirulina
description:
Sea smells fresh as a sea breeze!  The scent is such a popular one with both men and women that we kept the look tailored...that way everyone can enjoy using it.  It is a wonderful sea green with swirls of spirulina and shreds of soaps suspended in it.  Spirulina has a vast array of nutrients that benefit our skin but we especially love it because it has a calming effect on the skin.

The blend of essential oils is skin loving as well.  Then we topped it with arame seaweed and pink Himalayan salt.

Net wt. 4.5oz. in our signature packaging.

Made from organic and sustainably harvested oils and herbs.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Castor Oil, Unrefined Shea Butter, Essential Oils, Beeswax, Evening Primrose Oil, Tussah Silk, Titanium Dioxide, Ultramarine Blue, Spirulina, Pink Himalayan Salt, Arame Seaweed.

name: Slice Soap with Goat's Milk, Ground Oats, Ground Calendula and Shea Butter
description:
We have formulated Slice to be the mood lifting aromatheraputic sister to the ever popular Mamma Bird.  The only change we have made in that formula is the scent.  Slice is a spritely citrus blend of Tangerine, Orange and Grapefruit with a haunting finish of evergreens.  We have used our own dehydrated Blood Orange slices, organic goji berries, calendula, cornflowers and vanilla bean on the tops.

Not just a pretty face, Slice is a hardworking addition to any dry, itchy skin's bathing routine.  We all know how moisturizing and soothing oats are to the skin.  Goat's milk has proteins that actually kill bacteria on skin and it brings soap to the correct pH for our skin.  Calendula is anti-inflamatory, soothing and ultra healing.  If you know Little Birdie, then you know how much we like Calendula for the skin!

Our Shea Butter is unrefined and organic so all of the unsaponifiable parts of this nourishing butter are just sitting there waiting to add moisture.

Net wt. 4.5 oz. in our signature packaging.

Made from organic and sustainably harvested oils and herbs.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Unrefined Shea Butter, Essential Oils, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Jojoba Oil, Powdered Goat's Milk, Oat Flour,Calendula Petals, Tussah Silk, French Green Clay, Ultramarine Pink Oxide, Activated Bamboo Charcoal Powder, Dehydrated Oranges, Goji Berries, Cornflower Petals, Vanilla Bean Powder.

<strong> Cure Date is March 6<strong>

name: Sprout Soap with Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter
description:
We just love this one!  The scent is a totally delicious, soothing and uplifting blend of lemongrass, lavender and rose geranium.  We wanted an ultramoisturizing, mild soap so we formulated it with large amounts of cocoa butter and almost a pound (!) of shea butter in each small batch.  What resulted is a bar that has loads of vitamin rich moisture and is scented with incredibly beneficial essential oils.  Beautiful, Aromatheraputic, Moisturizing...a triple threat!



Net wt. 4.5oz. in our signature packaging.

Made from organic and sustainably harvested oils and herbs.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Ingredients:  Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Unrefined Shea Butter, Sodium Hydroxide, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Essential Oils, Beeswas, Tussah Silk, Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Activated Bamboo Charcoal Powder, Mica.

name: Goldfinch Balm Calendula Cream
description:
Goldfinch Balm is the most popular product we have ever had. This incredible concoction is a very strong infusion of calendula into oils and mixed with shea and mango butters.  We have left it unscented. 

Calendula is such a skin loving flower!  It soothes irritation and inflamation as well as promotes healing.  Our combination of ingredients works deep down in your skin to nourish, soothe and moisturize.  This cream/salve is intensely moisturizing and you only need a small, pea sized amount to work into your hands and lower arms.  At first it will seem like a little too much moisture but wait....after just a minute or two it disappears leaving the most incredible feel to your skin.  We are getting reports of all kinds of uses for this anti-inflamatory balm.  I know I can no longer be without!

We can't think of any area of dry skin that this wouldn't help. We have put it into 2oz screw top tins so that it fits into a pocket or purse.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

Ingredients: Calendula oil (olive and sweet almond), shea butter, mango butter, beeswax.

name: Mamma Bird Goat’s Milk & Shea Butter Exfoliating Soap
description:
Hands down our most popular soap, Mamma Bird is packed with nourishing, moisturizing and skin soothing ingredients.  We formulated this amazing soap to hold the maximum of great oils, unrefined shea butter, colloidal oats and ground calendula petals to polish, clean and moisturize your skin leaving you glowy and smooth.
A warm bright scent of citrus, fig, moss and spice envelopes you as you bathe and then fades gently away…never competing with other scents.


Goat’s milk and shea butter will balance your skin’s pH and fortify it with vitamins and moisture.  Plus, the protein in goat’s milk is reported to actually kill the bacteria known to cause acne. (bonus!!) Colloidal oats and ground calendula are especially soothing to itchy, sensitive skin.



Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Night Bird Plus Detoxifying Shea Butter Soap with Goat’s Milk & Activated Charcoal
description:
Unrefined shea butter, rice bran oil, goat’s milk and avocado oil are just a few of the ingredients in this soap that do a brilliant job of moisturizing your skin.  Scented with lavender, orange,  and vanilla it smells as clean as you are going to feel.

We use activated bamboo charcoal powder to detoxify contaminants and toxins from deep in the pores of your skin. (Especially great if you suffer from acne.)  The charcoal tints the lather grey…but don’t worry…it’s non-staining and rinses right down the drain.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar of soap in our signature packaging.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Pumpkin Moon Soap with Organic Pumpkin and Pumpkin Seed Oil
description:
Originally made for a seasonal soap, Pumpkin Moon is a delicious blend of orange, spice and other essential oils that complement the organic pumpkin and pumpkin seed oil.  It doesn't smell like pumpkin because we don't use synthetic fragrance oils. There are so many devotees that it is made year-round now. We are learning that many of the vitamin rich foods that we eat are actually very beneficial when used in skin care products.  Pumpkin is one of these that really help fight the effects of ageing skin.  We also added tons of cocoa butter, some evening primrose oil. a little unrefined beeswax and some Tussah silk to the formula.  You will love how silky smooth this soap feels and lathers.  There is a small amount of bamboo charcoal(that's the black swirls) to give your skin a little detox so, even though it is really great to look at, it is even better when you use it to bathe with.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar of soap in our signature packaging.

A complete listing of ingredients will be on the label.

name: Refresh Cambrian Blue Clay Soap with Shea Butter
description:
We have scented this beneficial clay soap with just the right mix of mint, rosemary and other essential oils for a refreshing and therapeutic experience. The essential oils we use not only smell great but have specific benefits for your skin. Peppermint contains menthol, is cooling to the skin and is antimicrobial. Rosemary is a skin toner and is often used in aromatherapy to lift moods. This soap is full of organic and unrefined oils and shea butter to hydrate and soothe. Cambrian Blue Clay is mined in Siberia and was deposited there during the Cambrian Age (that’s about 500 million years ago). This clay contains mineral salts and micro elements our body needs for health in a form that the body can absorb easily. To name a few of the reported benefits of this amazing clay…detoxifying, stimulates skin regeneration and blood circulation, and is helpful for many skin conditions. It’s one of the most beneficial clays around.
Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.
You will get a hand cut 4.5oz bar in our signature packaging. A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Mineral Mud Soap with Dead Sea Mud and Dead Sea Salts
description:
Problem skin?  This might be just the solution!  No need to make a glamorous looking bar.  This soap may not look like gold but when you use it for a week you may believe it is just as valuable.  The Dead Sea is invaluable for producing natural products that are loaded with healing minerals.  In addition, we have included Moor Mud.  Moor Mud is an ancient soup of nutrients and phytonutrients deposited there centuries ago by decaying plant matter.  It is healing, can help muscle aches and reduce joint swelling, is a natural exfoliator and hydrates.  In fact, there is so much it can do that we encourage you to look it up.

We topped this soap with a layer of Dead Sea Salt as well as including some in the soap itself.  This salt is actually made up of minerals and very little salt.  This is so good for eczema and psoriasis, but if you have broken the salts in this soap might sting and be a little harsh.

Because of the high mineral content it might be harder to get a lather in the beginning.  Our testers have found that after one or two uses it lathers great.  We like how one tester has incorporated it into her shower routine...she loves our Refresh soap and has very sentitive skin so she uses Mineral Mud three times a week alternating with Refresh.  Others use it everytime they wash.  Up to you...but you will love what it does for your skin.

The scent....a light mint with citrus.  The mint is softer in this bar than in the Refresh.

Made with organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging. A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.
WE HAVE SOLD OUT OF OUR JULY 20 CURE.  THE NEXT CURE DATE FOR MINERAL MUD IS AUGUST 25.

name: Pale Ale Soap with Shea Butter and White Kaolin Clay
description:
If we could serve this in a glass we would!  A little of the hop scent and add our own citrus blend with mossy notes to make this the perfect beer soap.   A very smooth, hard bar, the shea butter in this soap is a ridiculously generous amount so you will have skin that is clean feeling and not too dry.  We have had a number of guys use our previous formula for this soap for shaving  so we changed it to include white Kaolin clay.  Why?  Clays in soap give a great slip for your razor and they also dissolve dead skin cells and detoxify your skin. 
 
Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label

name: Stardust Shea Butter and French Green Clay Soap
description:
Everyone needs a little Stardust in their life!!! 
The first thing you notice is the abstract landscape of this soap.  You might also notice the gold dust (Stardust of course) and Safflower petals on top.

Next, prepare to be transported by the delicious scent of spiced oranges, woodsy notes, a little lavender, the barest touch of patchouli and other harmonious essential oils…It’s magical…just like, well…Stardust!



Now for the best part….the way your skin feels as you smooth this bar over it.  The unrefined shea butter adds moisture as the french green clay dissolves away dead skin cells and tightens pores.  

It’s simple and luxurious and enormously popular.

Always check to make sure you are not allergic to any ingredients.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Night Bird Shea Butter & Activated Bamboo Charcoal Detoxifying Soap
description:
Ever think you’d use a black soap?  Neither did we but now we can’t do without it.

Unrefined shea butter, rice bran oil and avocado oil are just a few of the ingredients in this soap that do a brilliant job of moisturizing your skin.

We use activated bamboo charcoal powder to detoxify contaminants and toxins from deep in the pores of your skin. (especially great if you suffer from acne.)  The charcoal tints the later grey…but don’t worry..it’s non-staining and rinses right down the drain.

Unscented for a completely natural, clean feeling that even sensitive skin can enjoy.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: In The Pink Facial Soap with Pink Kaolin Clay & Tea Tree Oil
description:
Pink kaolin clay is a key ingredient in a ton of face care products.  It’s a gentle yet effective way to rid your face of dull, dead skin cells, residual oils and contaminants.  It also tightens pores, leading to smoother looking skin.  This formula is good for all skin types.  Use it twice a day or once a week…you make the call.

The simple clean fragrance of this soap is deceptive…that great scent comes from powerful essential oils.  Tea tree oil is best known for its treatment of acne but it also reduces inflammation due to allergens.
Lavender is an antiseptic and used to treat acne, wrinkles, and other inflamations.  Geranium is another great oil for acne, dermatitis, mature skin and is great for all skin types.  So even the fragrance helps take care of your skin!

We made sure this mild soap was moisturizing and used plenty of avocado oil and unrefined cocoa butter.

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.



You will get a 3.75 ounce round bar packaged in our signature wrap.

name: Puppy Love Dog Soap With Ground Oats, Calendula, Neem Oil and Tea Tree Oil
description:
It seems that more and more of our beloved dogs are having skin issues.  They suffer from hot spots, inflamed skin, allergies, extreme itchiness not to mention being at the mercy of insects like fleas, ticks and mosquitoes. It made sense to me that all the additives in their “medicated” shampoos would bother their skin just like it did mine. 
   
Neem oil and Karanja oils are antiseptic, insecticidal and healing.  The essential oils are also antiseptic and insecticidal as well as great for the health of a dog’s coat.  The olive oil and lanolin condition the coat.  Oat flour and ground calendula are super soothing to angry, itchy skin.

Get your dog really wet and rub the bar across the fur to work up a lather.  Leave the lather on a few minutes and work it through to the skin.  Rinse well.  Here’s a hint; cut your bar of soap in half.  It’s easier to work with and your soap will last longer!

This isn’t a cure (or replacement for medicines from your vet)…just a great way to offer comfort from the irritation.  Sort of like your dog does for you.

Not for use on cats (the oils are dangerous for them).

You will get a 4.5 ounce bar in our signature packaging.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

A complete listing of ingredients is on the label.

name: Travelin’ Soaps in Our Three Most Popular Formulas
description: Just because you are traveling doesn’t mean your skin should suffer. We took the containers that are used for oval dial up sticks of deodorant (cap and all) and filled them with our most popular soaps. They are just the right size for travel. They fit easily in carry-on luggage (and at 2.5 oz you won’t get hassled by airport security, unless they want this soap too!), make-up bags, backpacks…you name it. Just dial up the amount of soap you want (about ½ inch is good) then, when you’re done, pop the top back on and toss in your bag. So say happy trails to junk on the road. Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs. You will get a 2.5 ounce container of your choice of three soaps. Sold Out Until August 10 Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic. Available Travelin’ Soaps are: Sea Soap with Shea Butter and Spirulina In The Pink Soap with Pink Kaolin Clay and Avocado Oil

options.name: In The Pink Soap with Pink Kaolin Clay and Avocado Oil
Sea Soap with Shea Butter and Spirulina

name: Pink Grapefruit  Bath Treats with Goat’s Milk, Cocoa Butter and Pink Himalayan Salt
description:
Pink Grapefruit essential oil is thought to lift your mood (and some days that is reason enough to pop one or two of these treats into your bath) but we’ve packed this little treat with real softening and conditioning power as well.

There are things like cocoa butter, glycerin and goat’s milk to condition your skin while baking soda and cornstarch give the goat’s milk plenty of help softening your water.  Just in case you need to soak some sore muscles we add a good measure of Epsom salts and Himalayan pink salt for its minerals.  

We pack them in two halves so you can decide just how much or how little you want in your bath (one half is good in a large tub, but to get the most out of your soak…try both).  

Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.

Made with organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.


We make these fresh with each order so shipping will be delayed in order to dry them properly.

name: Stardust Bath Treats with Goat’s Milk and Cocoa Butter
description:
These yummy treats are a cross between a bath bomb and a tub melt.   As they dissolve in the water they release a lot of things that condition your skin and ease tired, achy muscles.  Baking soda, cornstarch and goat’s milk make an instant soft water milk bath.   While the salts go to work on tired muscles and glycerin and cocoa butter soften and moisturize your skin, our Stardust fragrance changes an everyday bath into an escape.  

We pack them in two halves so you can decide just how much or how little you want in your bath (one half is good in a large tub, but to get the most out of your soak…try both).  

Always check the ingredients carefully to make sure you are not allergic.

Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.

We make these fresh when ordered so shipping is delayed five days for them to dry properly.

name: Lip Balms
description:
Not just any lip balm, ours are specifically formulated to soften, hydrate, repair and condition that fragile skin on your lips. Like all of our other products, we are after the best combination of specific natural ingredients for a purpose…in this case we want soft, smooth lips. The list of oils, butters and waxes in them speak for themselves but nothing can take the place of trying them and seeing how amazing your lips become. After just a few applications of this lip balm, you won’t believe how great your lips (and lipstick) look!
We have three kinds of lip balm:
Totally Naked Lip Balm…no scent except the natural scent of the ingredients.
Mochacino Lip Balm….because we use more cocoa butter and coffee butter in this one for an antioxidant boost and flavor oils.
A Little Minty…sometimes we want just a hint of mint on our lips so we put a dash of Peppermint essential oil and a little Stevia for a barely there mint flavor.
These lip balms stand up to pretty warm temperatures, but if you leave it in your car it will melt a little!
Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.
Made with organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.
You will receive a .15 oz shrink wrapped tube clearly labeled.
Contains some of the following depending on the kind of lip balm: Beeswax, Coconut oil, Unrefined shea butter. Unrefined cocoa butter, Coffee butter, Candilla wax, Castor oil, Grapeseed oil, Avocado oil, Meadowfoam seed oil, Vitamin E, Peppermint essential oil, Flavor oils, and Stevia.

name: Stardust Luxe Vitamin Enriched Lotion With Seabuckthorn Oil
description: It may look like a dessert, but it is our super rich, vitamin enriched luxe lotion. The rich orange color comes from unrefined seabuckthorn oil. Seabuckthorn oil is an ancient skin treatment that combats dryness and various symptoms of ageing and damaged skin. We also put in tons of our favorite extracts, oils, butters and vitamins (you have to check out the ingredient list!) to protect, repair, soothe and moisturize unlike any other lotion we have tried. Fragranced with our Stardust scent, this lotion absorbs quickly into your skin leaving it luminous and happy! With all these fantastic ingredients and yummy smell, it’s no wonder we named it “luxe”. You will get an ultra slim PET pump bottle with 8 ounces of lotion. Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs. Always check the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic. Ingredients: Aloe Vera Gel, Vegetable Glycerin, Emulsifying Wax, Hemp Oil, Unrefined Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Calendula Oil, Aloe Extract, Stearic Acid, Evening Primrose Oil, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extract, Borage Oil, Unrefined Sea Buckthorn Oil, Cromoist Oat Protein, Panthenol Pro Vitamin B5, Essential Oils, Modified Tapioca Starch, Leucidal Liquid SF and Microguard (Paraben and Formaldehyde Free Preservatives).

name: Totally Naked Lotion Bar
description: This concentrated moisturizing bar is our answer to those rough patches we all hate, you know…heels, knees, elbows. Smooth it on anything that needs some extra TLC. We do not scent these bars but you may smell white chocolate from the cocoa butter they contain. These lotion bars come in screw top tins so you can keep one by your bed, in your purse, or at your desk! To use: Rub directly on heels, elbows, etc. For hands, just rub the bar between your palms to melt a little of it and rub your hands together to spread the softened oils and butter on your hands and arms. For legs, repeat the directions for hands, rubbing the softened ingredients on your legs. Do not leave in hot car or direct sunlight or melting will occur. Always check ingredients to make sure you are not allergic. Made from organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs. You will get a 1.75 oz Lotion Bar in a metal, screw top tin. Ingredients: Beeswax, Sweet almond oil, Unrefined shea butter, Cocoa butter.

name: Mississippi Mud Sugar Scrub with Raw Cacao and Shea Butter
description:
How sweet it is! This decadent scrub is made with raw cacao butter, raw cacao paste, raw cacao powder, shea butter, tons of beneficial oils, orange peel powder and of course sugar. Raw cacao contains powerful anti-ageing antioxidants and vitamins many of which are not present in processed chocolate products. Dark chocolate topically helps maintain collagen, improves skin texture and hydration and is a natural antiseptic and anti-inflamatory. Sugar scrubs are a gentle way to polish and hydrate skin, discourage cellulite and improve circulation…who knew chocolate and sugar are as good for skin as they are for dessert!
We have added a touch of orange essential oil to the incredible chocolate aroma to make this smell like your favorite Grand Marnier Truffle!! (But remember, no matter how much it smells like your favorite dessert, don’t eat it!)
Directions for use: After bath or in shower, scoop some scrub into your hand and let it start to melt while you gently massage it into your skin in a circular motion. Then rinse well and pat dry with a towel. Use 1-2 times a week. Always take care when using a product containing oils in the shower or bath…oils can get slippery when wet!
Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.
Made with organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs.
Net wt. 4 oz

name: Stardust Sugar Scrub with Pink Kaolin Clay
description:
Our Stardust scent is a delicious blend of spiced citrus, florals, woods and patchouli essential oils. It’s a little known fact that patchouli essential oil is highly beneficial to the skin. (it’s antifungal, tightens and tones skin, has cell regenerating properties and can cut down on oily skin by regulating sebum production…and we thought it was just good for incense!) Pink kaolin clay is a gentle yet effective way to rid your body of dull, dead skin cells, residual oils and contaminants and sugar polishes up your skin, discourages cellulite and improves circulation. Like our other scrubs, we have added tons of hydrating oils and butters to really make this scrub a treat!
Directions for use: After bath or in shower, scoop some scrub into your hand and let it start to melt while you gently massage it into your skin in a circular motion. Then rinse well and pat dry with a towel. Use 1-2 times a week. Always take care when using a product containing oils in the shower or bath…oils can get slippery when wet!
Always check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic.
Made with organic and responsibly harvested oils and herbs. Net wt. 4 oz

name: Handmade Eastern Aromatic Cedar Soap Deck
description:
To really take the best care of your handmade soaps and make them last a lot longer, you need the best method of keeping your bar dry between uses.  We have found that our unfinished Eastern Cedar Soap Decks do a superior job at this.  We make these ourselves so that they are large enough to comfortably hold our large bars of soap.  One of the most durable weather resistant woods there is, this aromatic soap deck can be put on a shelf in your shower and it doesn’t need a dish under it. (A dish under the deck is a little neater by the tub or sink though.) The grooves in the top and bottom and the raw, unfinished wood make quick work of draining your soap.

You will be tempted to slip this deck into your sweater drawer or coat closet to discourage moths but don’t do that.  Just ask us and, if we have them,  we will send you a couple of small chunks of scrap in with your order to use for keeping your woolens insect free.
